Tunable.name: CONTINUE_SHOPPING_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: If the customer has this much time or more left in their total shop time, they'll start the browse/buy process over again after purchasing something. If they don't have this much time remaining, they'll quit shopping.

TunableTuple.name: PRICE_RANGE
TunableTuple.description: Statistics that are set to the min and max price range statistics. These are automatically added to the customer in this situation and will be updated accordingly. The stats should not be persisted -- the situation will readd them on load.

TunableList.name: PURCHASE_INTENT_CHANCE_CURVE
TunableList.description: A mapping of Purchase Intent Statistic value to the chance (0-1) that the customer will buy something during the buy state.

Tunable.name: PURCHASE_INTENT_STATISTIC
Tunable.description: A statistic added to customers that track their intent to purchase something. At the minimum value they will leave, and at max value they will immediately try to buy something. Somewhere in between, there's a chance for them to not buy something when they go to the buy state.
